home_hero_desc: AIGORA is not just storage. It is intelligent middleware that instantly delivers optimized prompts via MCP exactly when your agent needs them.
home_step1_desc: Pre-define expert-level multi-shot prompts and map them to specific keywords (e.g., code_review).
home_step2_desc: Connect your agent to infinite knowledge using just the AIGORA Server URL and your unique token. No complex SDKs.
home_step3_desc: When your agent triggers a keyword, AIGORA instantly injects the optimized prompt, maximizing your agent's capabilities.
